enum ACQUISITION_MODES

The acquisition mode enumeration.

Enumerator:
AM_NONE  No settings for acquisition mode.
AM_CONTINUOUS  Continuous acquisition mode.
AM_TRIGGER_MATCH  Trigger match acquisition mode.
